metadata.title: CVE-2024-23170 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Mbed TLS 2.x before 2.28.7 and 3.x before 3.5.2.There was a timing side channel in RSA private operations. This sidechannel could be sufficient for a local attacker to recover the plaintext.It requires the attacker to send a large number of messages for decryption,as described in "Everlasting ROBOT: the Marvin Attack" by Hubert Kario.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-23170` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmbedcrypto7t64 - 2.28.8-1
libmbedtls14t64 - 2.28.8-1
libmbedx509-1t64 - 2.28.8-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mbedtls package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.28.8-1').
